notes: The E-9 fire-control system provides CC Rocket Attack technology.
loadnotes: Stations 1 and 4 are fixed wing-tip pods for rockets, missiles, and fuel. Each can carry 2 factors of air-to-air rockets, giving a total of 4 factors for with pods. Each can also carry three RHM/IRM. The pod fuel is included in the internal fuel.
May use GAR-1/-1D RHMs and GAR-2/-2A IRMs. Typically carries three RHMs in one pod and three IRMs in the other.
